department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: 本課程介紹攝影測量的理論及數位處理方式，包含成像幾何、攝影測量方位求解、空中三角測量、影像匹配、及衛星影像幾何校正等。學生亦需透過作業獲得實現數位攝影測量方法之經驗。
goal.en: “This course introduces the principles and the digital processing of photogrammetry, including imaging geometry, photogrammetric orientation, photo triangulation, image matching, and geometric correction for satellite images. Students are also required to work on homework to have experience in realizing photogrammetry algorithms.“

outline.ch:
“(1) 攝影測量介紹
(2) 攝影原則
(3) 相機及相機率定
(4) 影像量測及校正
(5) 物空間坐標系統
(6) 垂直及傾斜攝影
(7) 攝影測量之數學模式
(8) 影像匹配
(9) 空中三角測量
(10) 衛星影像幾何校正
(11) 智慧城市模型重建“
outline.en:
“(1) Introduction to Photogrammetry
(2) Principle of Photography
(3) Camera and Camera Calibration
(4) Image Measurements and Refinements
(5) Object Coordinate Systems
(6) Vertical and Tilt Photographs
(7) Fundamental Mathematics in Photogrammetry
(8) Image Matching
(9) Photo Triangulation
(10) Geometric Correction for Satellite Images
(11) Building Reconstruction for Cyber City Modeling“

textbook.ch: “Wolf , P.R. , and Dewitt , B.A. ,2000 , “Elements of Photogrammetry with Applications in GIS , 3rd edition” , McGraw-Hill“
textbook.en: “Wolf , P.R. , and Dewitt , B.A. ,2000 , “Elements of Photogrammetry with Applications in GIS , 3rd edition” , McGraw-Hill“

gradMethod.ch:
“作業55％
報告30％
課程參與15％“

ch.competencies: 遙測與空間資訊專業能力

en.competencies: Professional competence in remote sensing and geoinformatics
